Text: I run windows 8, and when i have installed the game and try to run it, it says error:cant find d3dx9_30.dll on your comp, any idea guys??

@yb123:

If this is the very first DirectX9 game you're installing, it could well be you need to install DirectX 9.0c. A lot of games still need it, just like it happens with Windows 7.

Don't worry, the installer won't touch your DirectX11 files.

HTH
